alert.note: Alert for Schoharie (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Albany (Eastern New York and Western New England)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 13 at 5:52PM EDT until July 13 at 6:15PM EDT by NWS Albany
info.description: The National Weather Service in Albany has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southwestern Schoharie County in east central New York... * Until 615 PM EDT. * At 552 PM EDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Richmondville to near Meridale, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Cobleskill, Jefferson, Summit, Richmondville, West Richmondville, Baird Corners, Lawyersville, Warnerville, Lutheranville, West Fulton, Vintonton, Mineral Springs, Shutts Corners, Arabia, Barnerville, Howes Cave, Eminence, Sagendorf Corners, West Jefferson and Beards Hollow. Please report hail size...damaging winds and reports of trees down to the National Weather Service by email at Alb.Stormreport@noaa.gov... On Facebook at www.facebook.com/nwsalbany or twitter @nwsalbany HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Torrential rainfall is occurring with these storms, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
